entry.title: Valentines Day Messages Wishes for Facebook
entry.content:
best English'

Girls are not complicated. Seriously. How hard is it to say you’re pretty and give us chocolat

best English'

Okka sari dhagar lekapotte dear
Dear okka sari dhagar lekapotte
Adhi easyga gynapakam pettukovachu
Dhagara okka sari hounte but kani
Chala kastam parichipodaniki dear
Okka sari Happy Valentine’s Day


Valentines Day Messages Wishes For Facebook

TUM POCHO OR HUM NA BATAYN
ASAY TO HALAT NAHI
KISS KO KHABAR THEA SAWALE BADAL BIN BARSE AUR JATE HAIN!
SAWAN AYA LAIKEN ABBB HE KISMAT MAIN BARSAT NAHI!
TOOT GAYA JAB DIL TOO PHER YEAH SANS KHE NAGHME KYA MAHNE!
GONJ RAHE HAI KHUN SHANAYE JAB KHE KOI BAAT NAHI!
GHAM KHE ANDERON MAIN TUJH KO MAIN APNA SA BHE KHUN SAMJHOON!
TO PHER MERA TOO SAYA BHE MARE SATH NAHI!
MARE GHAM GHEEN HONE PER AHBAB HAIN SAB HE HIRAT MAIN!
JAISE PATHAR HO MARE SEENA MAIN JAZBATH NAHI!
GONJ RAHE HAI KHUN SHANAYE JAB KHE KOI BARAT NAHI!
SAWAN AYA LAIKEN APNE KISMAT MAIN BARSAT NHI
0300 2711 588

entry.title: Valentines Day 2014 Sms
entry.content:
best Full Text Greetings for Teddy Day 2014 on 10th February teddy day 2014

A kiss is a special thing…
that u can cant take wit-hout giving,
& u cant give wit-hout taking.
Enjoy kissing and kissing day.


best Full Text Greetings for Teddy Day 2014 on 10th February teddy day 2014

Missing a person is good thing
as it shows immense love about it.


Valentines Day 2014 Sms

As–u go 2–bed T2–night,
I beg the moon 2–give u light,
Telling my angels 2–hug you tight
And make sure you will b–all right,
I asked the gentle breeze 2—kiss u…
